page.title: 16In Conclusion
page.content: A 10 YEAR OLD CHILDS VIEW OF LIFE IN EDINGALE IN 1985. I like living in Edingale because it is quiet and peaceful. You can go for quiet walks and pick fruit from the hedgerows. We can take our dog for a walk over the fields and this would be impossible in a city or big town. There are fields with shire horses and cows and sheep. Sometimes we go fishing and we can go to the brook and paddle or try to catch little fish with a fishing net. How could you go fishing in the city amongst all the roads and houses? There are nice country smells here and no big factories, and not much smoke. In the city it is very noisy because lots of traffic goes by but in Edingale hardly any traffic comes.
